name: cluck
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] to make the low, interrupted noise that a chicken makes
[ I or T ] informal to express disapproval or other emotion by making a short, sharp sound with your tongue: to cluck in disapproval/amazement She shakes her head, smiles, and clucks her tongue.
[ I ] informal to express an unnecessary amount of sympathy, worry, or approval towards someone: The attendants clucked and fussed over passengers.
